languages.text: "Вашу Светлость интересуют обстоятельства вашего возвращения на корабль? Смею заверить, что урон посадочной палубе при посадке был нанесен совсем небольшой. Госпожа Хейдари сопроводила вас до ваших покоев, весьма смело касаясь персоны Вольного Торговца в местах, а в ответ на попытки оказать вам помощь вы изволили научить нас нескольким ифритским бранным выражениям, которым, по вашим словам, вас научила госпожа Хейдари".

"Would Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} care to learn the circumstances of your return to the ship? I can assure you that the landing deck was damaged minimally. Mistress Heydari escorted you to your quarters, rather boldly touching the person of the Rogue Trader, and in response to the crew's attempts to help you, you endeavoured to demonstrate your proficiency in several Efreet swear words that, according to you, Mistress Heydari had taught you earlier."
languages.original_text: "Вашу Светлость интересуют обстоятельства вашего возвращения на корабль? Смею заверить, что урон посадочной палубе при посадке был нанесен совсем небольшой. Госпожа Хейдари сопроводила вас до ваших покоев, весьма смело касаясь персоны Вольного Торговца в местах, а в ответ на попытки оказать вам помощь вы изволили научить нас нескольким ифритским бранным выражениям, которым, по вашим словам, вас научила госпожа Хейдари".

traits.locale_text: "Does Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} care to know the circumstances of your return to the ship? I can assure you that the damage to the landing deck was minimal. Mistress Heydari escorted you to your quarters, rather boldly touching the person of the Rogue Trader in inappropriate places, and in response to the crew's attempts to help you endeavoured to teach us a few Efreet swear words you said Mistress Heydari had taught you earlier."

"Does Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} care to know the circumstances of your return to the ship? I can assure you that the damage to the landing deck was minimal. Mistress Heydari escorted you to your quarters, rather boldly touching the person of the Rogue Trader in inappropriate places, and in response to the crew's attempts to help you endeavoured to teach us a few Efreet swear words you said Mistress Heydari had taught you earlier."

"Would Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} care to learn the circumstances of your return to the ship? I can assure you that the landing deck was damaged minimally. Mistress Heydari escorted you to your quarters, rather boldly touching the person of the Rogue Trader, and in response to the crew's attempts to help you, you endeavoured to demonstrate your proficiency in several Efreet swear words that, according to you, Mistress Heydari had taught you earlier."

"Would Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} care to learn the circumstances of your return to the ship? I can assure you that the landing deck was damaged minimally. Mistress Heydari escorted you to your quarters, rather boldly touching the person of the Rogue Trader, and in response to the crew's attempts to help you, you endeavoured to demonstrate your proficiency in several Efreet swear words that, according to you, Mistress Heydari had taught you earlier."

"Would Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} care to learn the circumstances of your return to the ship? I can assure you that the landing deck was damaged minimally. Mistress Heydari escorted you to your quarters, rather boldly touching the person of the Rogue Trader, and in response to the crew's attempts to help you, you endeavoured to demonstrate your proficiency in several Efreet swear words that, according to you, Mistress Heydari had taught you earlier."

"Would Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} care to learn the circumstances of your return to the ship? I can assure you that the landing deck was damaged minimally. Mistress Heydari escorted you to your quarters, rather boldly touching the person of the Rogue Trader, and in response to the crew's attempts to help you, you endeavoured to demonstrate your proficiency in several Efreet swear words that, according to you, Mistress Heydari had taught you earlier."

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie souhaite-t-elle connaître les circonstances de votre retour sur le vaisseau ? Je puis vous assurer que le pont d'envol n'a subi que des dégâts limités. Maîtresse Heydari vous a {mf|escorté|escortée} dans vos quartiers de façon plutôt, disons... audacieuse, vous touchant et, en réponse aux tentatives de l'équipage pour vous aider, vous avez montré votre talent en jurons éfrits qui, d'après vous, vous avaient été enseignés un peu plus tôt par maîtresse Heydari. »
languages.original_text: "Would Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} care to learn the circumstances of your return to the ship? I can assure you that the landing deck was damaged minimally. Mistress Heydari escorted you to your quarters, rather boldly touching the person of the Rogue Trader, and in response to the crew's attempts to help you, you endeavoured to demonstrate your proficiency in several Efreet swear words that, according to you, Mistress Heydari had taught you earlier."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie souhaite-t-elle connaître les circonstances de votre retour sur le vaisseau ? Je puis vous assurer que le pont d'envol n'a subi que des dégâts limités. Maîtresse Heydari vous a {mf|escorté|escortée} dans vos quartiers de façon plutôt, disons... audacieuse, vous touchant et, en réponse aux tentatives de l'équipage pour vous aider, vous avez montré votre talent en jurons éfrits qui, d'après vous, vous avaient été enseignés un peu plus tôt par maîtresse Heydari. »

languages.text: “大人，您是想知道回到船上之后发生了什么情况吗？我可以向您保证，着陆甲板只受到了轻微的损坏。海达利女士在护送您返回住处的时候，以相当大胆的行为触碰了您本人。而您为了报答她的帮助，您努力和她展示了您学会的几句艾弗里特脏话。据您所说，这些脏话是海达利女士早些时候教给您的。”
languages.original_text: "Would Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} care to learn the circumstances of your return to the ship? I can assure you that the landing deck was damaged minimally. Mistress Heydari escorted you to your quarters, rather boldly touching the person of the Rogue Trader, and in response to the crew's attempts to help you, you endeavoured to demonstrate your proficiency in several Efreet swear words that, according to you, Mistress Heydari had taught you earlier."

traits.locale_text: “大人，您是想知道回到船上之后发生了什么情况吗？我可以向您保证，着陆甲板只受到了轻微的损坏。海达利女士在护送您返回住处的时候，以相当大胆的行为触碰了您本人。而您为了报答她的帮助，您努力和她展示了您学会的几句艾弗里特脏话。据您所说，这些脏话是海达利女士早些时候教给您的。”

languages.text: "Möchte Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} gerne mehr über die Umstände Eurer Rückkehr auf das Schiff erfahren? Ich kann Euch versichern, dass das Landedeck nur minimal beschädigt wurde. Herrin Heydari hat Euch in Euer Quartier eskortiert und dabei die Person {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} recht kühn angefasst. Als Reaktion auf die Versuche der Crew, Euch zu helfen, habt Ihr versucht, Eure Kenntnis verschiedener Efreet-Schimpfwörter zu demonstrieren, die Euch Herrin Heydari vorher beigebracht hatte, wie Ihr kundgetan habt."
languages.original_text: "Would Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} care to learn the circumstances of your return to the ship? I can assure you that the landing deck was damaged minimally. Mistress Heydari escorted you to your quarters, rather boldly touching the person of the Rogue Trader, and in response to the crew's attempts to help you, you endeavoured to demonstrate your proficiency in several Efreet swear words that, according to you, Mistress Heydari had taught you earlier."

traits.locale_text: "Möchte Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} gerne mehr über die Umstände Eurer Rückkehr auf das Schiff erfahren? Ich kann Euch versichern, dass das Landedeck nur minimal beschädigt wurde. Herrin Heydari hat Euch in Euer Quartier eskortiert und dabei die Person {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} recht kühn angefasst. Als Reaktion auf die Versuche der Crew, Euch zu helfen, habt Ihr versucht, Eure Kenntnis verschiedener Efreet-Schimpfwörter zu demonstrieren, die Euch Herrin Heydari vorher beigebracht hatte, wie Ihr kundgetan habt."

languages.text: «{mf|Milord|Milady}, ¿querría saber cómo volvió a la nave? Le aseguro que la plataforma de aterrizaje no recibió demasiados daños. La señora Heydari {mf|lo|la} escoltó a sus aposentos, atreviéndose a tocar a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Ante los intentos de la tripulación por ayudarle, intentó demostrar su dominio de varias palabrotas de Efreet que, según usted, le había enseñado la señora Heydari».
languages.original_text: "Would Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} care to learn the circumstances of your return to the ship? I can assure you that the landing deck was damaged minimally. Mistress Heydari escorted you to your quarters, rather boldly touching the person of the Rogue Trader, and in response to the crew's attempts to help you, you endeavoured to demonstrate your proficiency in several Efreet swear words that, according to you, Mistress Heydari had taught you earlier."

traits.locale_text: «{mf|Milord|Milady}, ¿querría saber cómo volvió a la nave? Le aseguro que la plataforma de aterrizaje no recibió demasiados daños. La señora Heydari {mf|lo|la} escoltó a sus aposentos, atreviéndose a tocar a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Ante los intentos de la tripulación por ayudarle, intentó demostrar su dominio de varias palabrotas de Efreet que, según usted, le había enseñado la señora Heydari».

languages.text: 「陛下は船への帰還の状況をお聞きになりたいのですか？着艦デッキの損傷は最小限でした。ヘイダリ女史が陛下をお部屋まで案内しましたが、その際に自由開拓者に触れるという、かなり大胆な行為がありました。そして、クルーが助けようとしたのに対し、陛下はイフリート語でいくつかの罵声を発せられておりました。お言葉によると、ヘイダリ女史が以前に教えたものだとのことでしたね」
languages.original_text: "Would Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} care to learn the circumstances of your return to the ship? I can assure you that the landing deck was damaged minimally. Mistress Heydari escorted you to your quarters, rather boldly touching the person of the Rogue Trader, and in response to the crew's attempts to help you, you endeavoured to demonstrate your proficiency in several Efreet swear words that, according to you, Mistress Heydari had taught you earlier."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下は船への帰還の状況をお聞きになりたいのですか？着艦デッキの損傷は最小限でした。ヘイダリ女史が陛下をお部屋まで案内しましたが、その際に自由開拓者に触れるという、かなり大胆な行為がありました。そして、クルーが助けようとしたのに対し、陛下はイフリート語でいくつかの罵声を発せられておりました。お言葉によると、ヘイダリ女史が以前に教えたものだとのことでしたね」

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, gemiye dönüşünüz esnasındaki durum hakkında bilgilendirilmek ister misiniz? İniş güvertesindeki hasarın son derece minimal olduğu konusunda sizi temin ederim. Üstat Heydari, Hür Tacir olmanıza rağmen oldukça yakın temasta bulunarak size odanıza kadar eşlik etti. Size yardımcı olmaya meyleden mürettebata yanıt olaraksa Üstat Heydari'nin öğrettiğini söylediğiniz birtakım İfrit küfürlerini ne kadar üstün bir yeterlilikle sarf edebileceğinizi sergilediniz."
languages.original_text: "Would Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} care to learn the circumstances of your return to the ship? I can assure you that the landing deck was damaged minimally. Mistress Heydari escorted you to your quarters, rather boldly touching the person of the Rogue Trader, and in response to the crew's attempts to help you, you endeavoured to demonstrate your proficiency in several Efreet swear words that, according to you, Mistress Heydari had taught you earlier."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, gemiye dönüşünüz esnasındaki durum hakkında daha fazlasını öğrenmek ister misiniz? İniş güvertesindeki hasarın son derece minimal olduğu konusunda sizi temin ederim. Heydari Hanım bir Hür Tacir olmanıza rağmen oldukça yakın temasta bulunarak size odanıza kadar eşlik etti. Size yardımcı olmaya meyleden mürettebata yanıt olarak ise, Heydari Hanım'ın öğrettiğini söylediğiniz bazı Efreet küfürlerini ne kadar üstün bir yeterlilikle sarf edebileceğinizi sergilediniz."
